DOC.brief_title: Attention Shaping Procedures Improving Psychosocial Skills Among Adults With Schizophrenia
DOC.detailed_description: Schizophrenia disable mental disorder interfere person 's ability function alone social situation . Various treatment effective treat schizophrenia , include antipsychotic medication cognitive therapy . Psychosocial skills training , type cognitive therapy , often use help people schizophrenia cope condition improve social function day-to-day life . However , many individual schizophrenia experience difficulty pay attention , significant barrier successful outcomes psychosocial skill train intervention . Attention shape procedure ( ASP ) behavioral intervention help individual impaired attention capacity benefit skills-based treatment . This study evaluate effectiveness ASP improve attentiveness learn ability people undergo psychosocial skill train treatment schizophrenia . Participants 5-month , single-blind study randomly assign ASP plus basic conversation skill training ( BCS ) , social skill train group , BCS alone . Training session group hold participant attend regular hospital visit . During first month , participant complete two session interview , self-report scale , social cognitive functional assessment . Over next 3 month , train session group occur twice week approximately 1 hour . ASP session focus set goal increase quality duration participant ' attentiveness psychosocial intervention . BCS train participant follow five skill area : recognize verbal non-verbal cue ; start friendly conversation ; keep conversation go ; end conversation politely ; incorporate skill together . During last month , participant attend two interview session last approximately 4 hour . One follow-up session occur 6 month complete intervention .
